channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux

item.title: CVE-2017-15121|2024-08-05T19:50:16.100Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- red%20hat%20enterprise%20linux
item.description: A non-privileged user is able to mount a fuse filesystem on RHEL 6 or 7 and crash a system if an application punches a hole in a file that does not end aligned to a page boundary.
